name: Talos the Dragonbum
text:
Talos the Dragonbum,
Atmoran Conqu'rer scum,
Wanted to conquer some.


Not for a dest'ny great
, There's no design in his head,
He lusts for coin instead!


To the elven realms' regret
And the men's armies' dead,
Talos did win - too bad!


Tamriel danced to his windy drum,
To palace from icy chum,
All hail Talos the Dragonbum!
